response.overview: After picking up a traumatized young hitchhiker, five friends find themselves stalked and hunted by a chainsaw-wielding killer and his family of equally psychopathic killers.
response.tagline: What you know about fear...doesn't even come close.
response.title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre
